name: Sudoblock Puzzle
description:
This addictive 9-in-1 block puzzle game is designed to help you emotionally recharge and provide a soothing and relaxing experience. Every single block placed is a test of strategy and foresight. In Sudoblock, you need to make as many lines or 3x3 squares as possible to achieve the best score. You can challenge your score with your friends or players around the world.

Sudoblock Puzzle Game features:
• Place blocks to fill the grid
• Fill a row, column, or 3x3 square to earn points
• Endless levels – keep playing until you can’t fill any more
• Daily challenge mode
• Relax and stay focused with block puzzles
• Free and easy to play - Hard to master

With stunning woody visuals and new gameplay mechanics, Sudoblock: Block Puzzle Games is a breath of fresh air in the free puzzle games. Once you master the game, try to beat your personal best and write your name on the global leaderboard. Hours of fun are ahead of you!
